path.style: vector-effect: none; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(102, 197, 204); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(229, 236, 246); stroke-opacity: 1;
vector-effect: none; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(246, 207, 113); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(229, 236, 246); stroke-opacity: 1;
vector-effect: none; opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0.5px; fill: rgb(248, 156, 116); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(229, 236, 246); stroke-opacity: 1;
